title: Hit the Road Jack
description: Some hunt, and some are hunted. With lives at stake, literally, Lexi travels the globe pursuing the element of surprise against her enemy. Unfortunately, it seems there’s a mole in her tightknit group. Lexi is forced to reevaluate her relationships, old and new, as her target closes in on her. Can her friendships survive the pressure of the front lines? And can her relationship with Kellan survive a game of cat and mouse? Predictions aren’t always accurate, or are they?
author: Christin Lovell
